title: Settings
playWithSettingsTip: Try to play with settings to get x100 out of your journal — just facts.
setNotificationTimePrompt:
Please enter a time for your daily journaling reminder using 24-hour format.

Example: '21:00' for 9 PM.

This time will be interpreted in YOUR LOCAL TIMEZONE: {{currentOffsetDisplay}}

(We'll convert it to UTC before saving)
notificationTimeSetConfirmation: Great! I'll send you notifications at {{localTime}} in your timezone ({{currentOffsetDisplay}}) 🌟
notificationTimeSaveError: Sorry, something went wrong saving your notification time.
invalidTimeFormat: Please enter a valid time in 24-hour format (e.g., '21:00'). Or click '❌ Cancel' to exit.
setUtcOffsetPrompt:
Please select or enter your UTC offset (e.g., +2, -5, 0).

Your UTC offset is used to correctly schedule notifications at your preferred local time. Example: UTC+2, UTC-5. Select an option or type it in (e.g. "+5:30").
detectedUtcOffsetInfo: We think your offset might be: UTC{{detectedOffset}}
cannotDetectUtcOffsetInfo: We could not detect your UTC offset automatically.
utcOffsetSetConfirmation: Your UTC offset has been set to UTC{{newOffset}}.
utcOffsetSaveError: Sorry, something went wrong saving your UTC offset. Please try again.
invalidUtcOffsetFormat: Sorry, that doesn't appear to be a valid UTC offset. Please use formats like "+2", "-5:30", "0", or select from the keyboard.
